summary: A multimodal neural network class that processes and fuses visual and textual data to generate joint representations or predictions, managing model configuration, loading, and inference across image and language modalities.
business_intent: To provide a ready-to-use foundation for applications that need combined visual and textual understanding, such as image captioning, visual question answering, cross‑modal retrieval, content moderation, and other AI services that leverage joint vision‑language insights.
